programmes.show_description: These are the legendary rock stars that made the 80s! Expect Meat Loaf, Bonnie Tyler, Queen, Bon Jovi, AC/DC, Iron Maiden & loads more!
He's sung and played bass with many over the years, but fame came as one of the original Sex Pistols in 1976. Currently with Blondie, Glen picks his 25 punk & new wave favourites.
Party pop rock anthems spanning 5 decades! From Queen, Kiss & Aerosmith to Blur, Paramore & The White Stripes.
These are power ladies who really rock! From Avril Lavigne and Pink to Amy Lee and Hayley Williams.
Live it loud and Max out on the finest rock anthems! Featuring The Stroke, Sum 41, Linkin Park, Feeder & Limp Bizkit. This is Now Rock!
Starting in 2007 - 45 minutes of the biggest rock songs from Paramore!
Turn it up to 11 for the finest rock anthems! Featuring Kings Of Leon, The Killers, Green Day, Biffy Clyro & The Foo Fighters. This is Now Rock!
A decade of girls and guitars - from Republica and Catatonia to Cher and Debbie Harry.
Number 1 rock songs from the last 50 years! With mega hits from the Arctic Monkeys & KOL right back to legends like The Stones & T.Rex!
From Journey and The Jam at the start of the decade to Guns N' Roses and Billy Joel at the end - these are 3 hours of feelgood rock n roll anthems from the 80s.
The most iconic & ear-shattering rock songs that shaped the genre! Including Led Zeppelin's timeless Whole Lotta Love & AC/DC's rebellious Highway to Hell. Crank it up & enjoy!
Number 1 rock songs from the last 50 years! With mega hits from the Arctic Monkeys & KOL right back to legends like The Stones & T.Rex!
Nicky Horne presents his favourite 30 Kick Ass Videos. which need to sit in the hall of fame for Rock Video Greatness. Featuring Bon Jovi, David Bowie, Kate Bush, Nirvana and Ozzy!

programmes.show_name: Turn Up The Pop Punk Anthems!
programmes.show_description: Turn up your spreakers to 11 and live life even louder! 1 hour of 00s Pop Punk Anthems in order, featurng Green Day, Blink-182, Sum 41, Bowling For Soup & The All-American Rejects.
The most fabulous glam rock icons from the satin & glitter of 70s through to the bold new look of today. Glam Rock never left us, it just changed outfits!
Turn it up to 11 all weekend for the finest rock anthems! Featuring Kings Of Leon, The Killers, Green Day, Biffy Clyro & The Foo Fighters. This is Now Rock!
These monsters were created for your enjoyment! 30 of the biggest, spine tingling anthems from legends like Meatloaf and Kiss through to My Chemical Romance and YungBlud!
Your weekend anthems and the biggest rock songs from the last 50 years! From the Beatles and the Stones in the 60s right through to One Republic and Kings Of Leon in the 10s.
The 80s was the decade where rock & big hair were inseparable! Just look at Tina Turner, Bonnie Tyler, U2, Whitesnake & Marillion.
Your weekend anthems and the biggest rock songs from the last 50 years! From the Beatles and the Stones in the 60s right through to One Republic and Kings Of Leon in the 10s.
A solid hour of crossover rock Anthems from the 21st Century. From Blink 182 in 2000 to OneRepublic in 2013.
A decade of mega hits and the loudest anthems! Expect Biffy Clyro, Linkin Park, Blink 182, Evanescence, Fall Out Boy & loads more!
Nicky brings you rock gods & goddesses who unleash pure power delivering 25 of the most amazing riffs that are firmly etched into rock DNA forever!
Your weekend anthems and the biggest rock songs from the last 50 years! From the Beatles and the Stones in the 60s right through to One Republic and Kings Of Leon in the 10s.
This wild journey from 1967 to 2012 ranges from the hilariously absurd Electric Six to playful parodies from Blink-182 and a random tree-looking deer from Fall Out Boy!
Your weekend anthems and the biggest rock songs from the last 50 years! From the Beatles and the Stones in the 60s right through to One Republic and Kings Of Leon in the 10s.
25 of the greatest rock bands of the noughties featuring Paramore, Bullet For My Valentine, Slipknot and My Chemical Romance.
Turn it up to 11 all weekend for the finest rock anthems! Featuring Kings Of Leon, The Killers, Green Day, Biffy Clyro & The Foo Fighters. This is Now Rock!
Alex Baker brings you the best, most sing-a-longable, rock party bangers of all time. If you love Green Day, The Foo Fighters, Bon Jovi and BMTH, then you are in for a treat!
Turn up your spreakers to 11 and live life even louder! 50 All-Killer Anthems in order from Blink 182 in 2000 to The Killers at the end of the Decade!
Your weekend anthems and the biggest rock songs from the last 50 years! From the Beatles and the Stones in the 60s right through to One Republic and Kings Of Leon in the 10s.
